component.name: Open Alert Viewer
component.summary: Fetch alerts from Prometheus, Nagios or Icinga servers

description.p: Open Alert Viewer is a libre / open source app that displays server and network alerts to system administrators and site reliability engineers. It requires an account on a network monitoring server running Prometheus, Nagios or Icinga.
Supported: Prometheus v0.16.0+, Nagios Core 4.x and Icinga 2.12.0+, via Basic Authentication
